Html:
I get the following error when trying to export to .xlsx any help would be appreciated.

[Tue Sep 07 16:03:23 2010] [error] [client 172.16.17.72] PHP Fatal error:  Class 'XMLWriter' not found in /var/www/html/retention/Classes/PHPExcel/Shared/XMLWriter.php on line 71

R Thorn
Never mind.  It's been a long day, I figured it out.  I didn't have php_xml installed.
